meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> has a big <radical>drop</radical> of liquid in his hand... but then he bounces it! The drop was really a <kanji>ball</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: When he's done playing with it, the king gives his <kanji>ball</kanji> to <reading>Tama</reading>ra (たま), the resident ball girl, for safekeeping.
